me.elrod.pureio

Class LinkedList<A>

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.elrod.pureio.LinkedList<A>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LinkedList.Cons, LinkedList.Nil

    public abstract class LinkedList<A>
extends java.lang.Object
    A simple, purely functional linked-list implementation. We are already re-inventing most of the world, so why not? This doesn't seem to exist in the Java stdlib. If/when we depend on FJ, we should use their List. For now, implement the basics.

        Catamorphism. This does **NOT** trampoline and therefore will overflow the stack very quickly.
